description: This is the main Dart source file for a Flutter application. It defines the main entry point, application widget, home page widget, and UI layout including app bar, text, and progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, setting up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a customizable title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the user interface of MyHomePage, displaying a scaffold with app bar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, calls runApp with the root widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, returning MaterialApp and Scaffold respectively.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage widget.
